_header: It is heard of saints sere
_description: Life of St. Nicholas, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
It is herde of sanctis sereþat seruit god til þai ware
                    here…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…oure al þis warld be land & se& euire al tyme so
                    mot It be
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.229-45.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.481-514.
